title: Sudipto Mundle: How artificial intelligence has begun to reshape India’s challenge of job generation
description: Industrial policy can still create jobs in the short term and buy India time as AI reshapes the larger labour market. But technical education must be tweaked to meet AI-driven demand for new skill sets. Agricultural productivity, meanwhile, could count on an AI boost.

title: Moody's Ratings flags AI’s 15% global productivity boost - but warns of inequality, job shocks
description: Artificial intelligence promises a significant boost to global productivity over the next decade. However, this advancement also brings risks of increased inequality and job displacement. Advanced economies are set to benefit more, potentially widening global income gaps. Governments and companies must adapt proactively to harness AI's benefits and mitigate its challenges.

title: Anthropic no longer bound by its own AI safety pauses - here’s what changed
description: Once seen as the most safety-conscious player in artificial intelligence, Anthropic is now stepping away from one of its key commitments, pausing model development when safety lags behind capability. The move marks a major shift in the company’s philosophy as the global AI race intensifies.
content: The guardrails appear to be coming off at Anthropic, the AI lab founded by former OpenAI employees who once championed responsible AI development. The company has released a new version of its Responsible Scaling Policy (RSP), which weakens one of it... [3230 chars]

title: Asian shares mostly rise after Nvidia earnings beat expectations
description: Asian stock markets have mostly advanced following stronger-than-expected earnings from chipmaker Nvidia, which helped ease some investor fears over the boom in artificial intelligence
content:
HONG KONG (AP) — U.S. futures fell while Asian shares mostly advanced on Thursday after strong-than-expected earnings from chipmaker Nvidia helped ease some investor worries over the artificial intelligence boom.
